data.name: Rogue Weapon
data.detailed_description:
Procedurally Generated Areas

Levels are a combination of handcrafted and procedurally generated areas creating replayability but, consistently fun gameplay.

Unleash Your Arsenal

Teach your captors a lesson by unleashing an arsenal of unique weapons upon them.

Customize With Different Skills/Abilities

Try different abilities each run to find your perfect combination.

High Replayability

Test different strategies and skills with each run from the silly and ridiculous to the pure sweaty.

data.short_description: Roguelite replayability meets FPS action in Rogue Weapon as you clear enemy outposts and try to escape your captors. Whether you do so quietly or with pure chaos is up to you.

  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3610QM
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 560X 4GB or Nvidia Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
